text.section: In this section, "Council" means the Procurement Advisory Council.
There is a Procurement Advisory Council.

section.section: If the State Treasurer is unable to attend a meeting of the Procurement Advisory Council, the Treasurer may designate the Deputy Treasurer to attend the meeting.

If a member of the Council listed in paragraph (1) (ii) through (v) of this subsection is unable to attend a meeting of the Procurement Advisory Council, the member may designate the Chief Procurement Officer of the agency to attend the meeting.

text.section: The Secretary of the Board is Chairman of the Council.
The Council shall meet at least quarterly each year.
The Procurement Advisor is the principal staff of the Council and the Council shall have any additional staff that the Board authorizes in accordance with the State budget.
